text: @realDonaldTrump Trump's on Twitter congratulating Texas for their big win. Supreme Court announces* that lack of immunity to COVID-19 does not entitle a voter to an absentee ballot. Yet, their decision was announced via remote proceedings because of lack of immunity to COVID. Trump =anti-Christ.
